description:
If I do the following http request, I get a 500 response back. It looks like an uncaught KeyError that needs to be returned as a 400 or 422.

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name":"server1"}' -v -H "Accept: application/xml" -H "X-Auth-Token: ${NOVA_TOKEN}" http://localhost:8774/v1.1/servers

< HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error
< Content-Length: 154
< Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
< Date: Tue, 14 Jun 2011 15:09:48 GMT
< 
<cloudServersFault code="500" xmlns="http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/v1.0">
    <message>
        'server'
    </message>
</cloudServersFault>
title: OSAPI: 500 on POST /servers with malformed entity
